heading: Wood Industry
title: Scalable Wood Industry ERP for Manufacturing
description: Wood manufacturing ERP software is custom-built for businesses in the wood products and furniture industry. It handles everything from material planning and cut-list creation to production tracking, inventory management and finance all within a unified platform. With integration into design tools and real-time visibility across your workshop, you gain control over project costs, job status and delivery timelines from start to finish

infoCards.title: Inventory & Material Usage
infoCards.description: Accurate stock control for wood, laminates, hardware and fittings

faqData.question: How does Wood ERP improve inventory and material planning?
faqData.answer: It offers a clear overview of stock levels-from timber and hardware to finished goods-and keeps track of multi-branch inventory in real time. The system also supports automated reorder alerts, ensuring the right materials are available exactly when needed.

faqData.question: How does ERP software help in wood manufacturing?
faqData.answer: It automates procurement, optimizes cutting plans, schedules production and tracks inventory to minimize waste and improve efficiency.
